name: SLEEPOVER
description: Unique 1v1 game mode for an intimate multiplayer horror experience. You're either the Slasher who is loud and has a knife, or the Vet who is sneaky and can subdue the Slasher from behind. (Bonus Multiplayer Free-For-All, Coop and Team Deathmatch modes featuring AI enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 or 32 Bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
